## Quote > More on semantic markup: > > - [Semantic Structure â€“ WebAIM](http://webaim.org/techniques/semanticstructure/) ## Table | Name | Type | Default | Description | | :----- | :------ | :-----: | :-------------------------------------------- | | alt | String | | Passed through to alt on img tag | | size | Number | 20 | adds the `avatar-small` class if less than 24 | | src | String | | The source url of the avatar image | | square | Boolean | false | Used to create a square avatar | ## Code block ### Html code ```html ``` To provide the code blocks use the following markdown syntax. You can specify the language for proper highlighting. {` ${'```'}html ${'```'} `} ### Live example The code in the examples can be rendered so that they can be living! ```html live Label ``` Merely add `live` attribute next to the language. {` ${'```'}html live Label ${'```'} `} ### Example without code Or you can provide a living example of the component but hide its code. ```html live nocode Label ``` This is done with an additional `nocode` attribute. {` ${'```'}html live nocode Label ${'```'} `} ### React live examples Live examples work also with the linked React components. You can give a code example and render its preview. ```jsx live Primary ``` {` ${'```'}jsx live Primary ${'```'} `} Or you can choose to hide the code block leaving only the preview. ```jsx live nocode Primary ``` {` ${'```'}jsx live nocode Primary ${'```'} `} And the code blocks alone work for React examples as well. ```jsx Primary ``` {` ${'```'}jsx Primary ${'```'} `} ## Special blocks ### Do and don't #### With images Use brief and direct communication Don't use wordy and redundant copy #### With HTML Use brief and direct communication Don't use wordy and redundant copy #### With makrdown (TODO) Use brief and direct communication **test** Don't use wordy and redundant copy ### Caption import { Caption } from '@bridgetool/gatsby-theme-dev' A beautiful husky puppy. ## React components from a global scope Button Danger ## Live React ```jsx live Button Danger Button Outline Button Primary ```
